caption:
In the evolving landscape of haircare, the trend towards “premiumization” has captured the attention of discerning consumers. Nouvelle’s Body Booster line embodies this trend, offering technologically advanced, vegan, and user-friendly products that deliver a naturally sophisticated look.

Body Booster’s Olfactory Pyramid

Top Notes: Bergamot, Monoi, Pear, Yuzu, Coconut, Peach
Heart Notes: Orange Flowers, Jasmine, Geranium, Heliotrope
Base Notes: Musk, Sandalwood, Amber, Vanilla

Nouvelle’s commitment to a sustainable and innovative approach ensures that Body Booster is the ultimate solution for dull hair lacking body and vitality. Experience the luxury and effectiveness of premium haircare with Nouvelle.
